thread.title: You Aren't Ready For These Photos of Blue Ivy Dressed as Prince

author: Quinn Keaney
title: You Aren't Ready For These Photos of Blue Ivy Dressed as Prince
text:
Blue Ivy at the 2017 Grammys You Aren't Ready For These Photos of Blue Ivy Dressed as Prince February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 You Aren't Ready For These Photos of Blue Ivy Dressed as Prince 
We thought we were ready for Blue Ivy's appearance at the Grammys, but we were wrong. Beyoncé and Jay Z's adorable 5-year-old daughter (and soon-to-be big sister !) attended the show dressed as a miniature version of late singer and fashion icon Prince , and the level of cuteness sent us into brief cardiac arrest. Blue sat on her dad's lap in the audience just like she did at the 2014 VMAs . Although her pint-size suit wasn't Prince's signature purple color, the white ruffled shirt and pendant were a perfect way to honor him. Not exactly a surprise after seeing how she slayed her Michael Jackson costume a few years ago! Related:
